wikipedia_page.main: Hannah Brand (1754–1821) was an English actress, poet and playwright. After her brief theatrical career, she became a governess.

response: In 1791, Hannah Brand produced a new play called 'Huniades or The Siege of Belgrade', which played to a packed house in the King's Theatre, Norwich.The Enemy at the Gate, p.56

An English poet and playwright Hannah Brand wrote five-act tragedy about the battle and siege of Belgrade, which was first performed in 1791. A fictional account from the viewpoint of a Christian mercenary is Christian Cameron, Tom Swan and the Siege of Belgrade from 2014 to 2015.
